::CyberShark::

    He received the message and stopped in his tracks. What=
 should he do? Should he continue to the Destron base? Or go back and wait =
of orders?
    "Vulois, there was no luck with the Predacons, I am going to=
 the Destron base," CyberShark said. "I will accompany Battera on her way u=
p."
    "Battera, it's me, CyberShark," He said on another frequency. "The =
Embassy is moving, as I'm sure you've heard. Comm me once your ready to lea=
ve, I'll join you."
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: minime_316@hotm=
ail.com 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 29, 2000 7:47 PM=

  Subject: Abandoning the embassy



       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page |=
 Start a new group!  



  Vulois turned to Child and Windrazor.

  "I have=
 been thinking. With all my worry about HeraldAngel's true 
  purpose, The =
Alliance's cruel beating and murder of Soundwave, and 
  the fact that the =
Predacons and Maximals have not responded to any of 
  our calls yet, I am =
afraid of an attack on the embassy. We have 
  already had one, but I'm thi=
nking n the colossal scale, which none of 
  us could survive. That's why I=
 have decided to abandon the embassy. 
  We are going to move everything to=
 my old mountain lair. We take all 
  the technology, and it's only a bit n=
orth from here. But it's inside 
  the mountain. The trail is trecherous, a=
nd it will be virtually 
  impossible to attack. We will leave the empty sh=
ell of the embassy 
  for any group that wants a base. Both of you, go and =
tell the Peace 
  Angels of our move, and get your things together. Than we=
 can start 
  taking apart the technology. We should leave by next week. Wh=
en we 
  arrive their Child, you will be trained. I know you want it now, b=
ut 
  what would be the point if we were killed before it was finished. And=
 
  you will still see your mother, not to worry. Now go! I will join you 
=
  in a moment.

  Vulois opened a comm to Battera and Cybershark.

  "Batte=
ra, Cybershark, it's Vulois. Just to let you know that we're 
  abandoning =
the embassy. We are going back to the mountain base. 
  Whenever you are re=
ady to come back, go there. Battera, you know the 
  path from the old days=
, but becareful, it is still trecherous. And 
  Cyberhsark, since you have =
not been there, Comm us and we'll come get 
  you. Over and out!"

  Vulois=
 went inside to start taking the main computer boarsd out.
